body.p: The Dell Red Hat Cloud Solutions Bill of Materials Guide contains the full bill of materials (BOM) listing for the PowerEdge R630 and R730Xd server configurations.

The R630 and R730xd configurations are used with 10GbE networking. To ensure that the network is HA ready an additional network card is required in each node. Refer to the Dell Red Hat Cloud Solutions Bill of Materials Guide which outlines the supported cards and includes them as part of the solution.
